Detailed Description

Class that handles all printing to log file (extra data file) when correcting map errors.

Definition at line 26 of file MELogFilePrinter.h.

Member Function Documentation

vector<MC2String> MELogFilePrinter::convertEDStrings (  vector< MC2String >  src,
CharEncoding *  charEncoder,
bool  isLogComment
)  [static, private]
 

Converts a vector with extra data record sub strings using a given char encoding object.

Each sub string is converted and added to the output vector. If the sub strings vector is the extra data log comment string, sub string nr 4 is not converted (original value) since it already has the correct char encoding.

Parameters:
src The extra data strings vector to convert.
charEncoder The char encoding object to use.
isLogComment Tells if the sub strings vector to convert is the extra data log comment string (true) or one part of the extra data record (false).

void MELogFilePrinter::print (  vector< MC2String >  logCommentStrings,
const char *  edTypeString,
MC2String  identString,
vector< MC2String >  valueStrings
)  [static]
 

Print to extra data file.

If the mc2 code is utf8 compiled the extra data file will be written in utf-8, else it is written in latin-1.

Parameters:
logCommentStrings The extra data record comment created by each editDialog. Includes EndOfRecord-tag.
edTypeString String for which extra data record type we are writing, e.g. "removeNameFromItem", created by each editDialog. Exclude separator.
identString The item/node/conn identification string, created by each editDialog.
valueString The correction we are making, created by each editDialog. Does not include the ending "EndOfRecord;"-tag
